dcterms:creator: Ganeshan Malhotra
Abdul Waheed
Aseem Srivastava
Md Shad Akhtar
Tanmoy Chakraborty
dcterms:description: HOPE is a benchmark counseling conversation dataset containing dyadic interactions between therapists and clients, annotated with dialogue-acts. It includes 12.8K utterances from 212 sessions, focusing on mental health discussions.
dcterms:title: HOPE

dcterms:creator: Andreas Stolcke
Klaus Ries
Noah Coccaro
Elizabeth Shriberg
Rebecca Bates
Daniel Jurafsky
Paul Taylor
Rachel Martin
Carol Van Ess-Dykema
Marie Meteer
dcterms:description: The Switchboard Dialogue-act corpus (SWDA) is a dataset used for automatic tagging and recognition of conversational speech, containing annotated dialogue acts for telephone conversations.
dcterms:title: Switchboard Dialogue-act corpus (SWDA)
